item.title: Blender Models
item.description: This is some of the work I’ve made by working with Blender, right now I’m working on the “Complete Blender Creator: Learn 3D Modelling for Beginners” with Blender 3.2

item.title: Drawings
item.description: Those are some drawings i made for the “Sketch a day” app.
